editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The enchantingly eccentric Rusty Lake series heads underground! Solve strange puzzles in train stations representing different eras of a womans life.

You might get stuck the first time you play Gorogoa. But once the gears of your brain settle into the right configurations, youll see how smart this mix of art and perspective really is. Layers pile upon layers, doors transport you between realities, strange creatures and wild environments blend together into a fascinating interactive collage youll want to peel apart to discover what lies underneath.

Mesmerising from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, youll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. Its a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwos adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.
editorialNotes.short: Traverse mind-bending levels that are structurally impossible

editorialNotes.standard: Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, its as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

editorialNotes.standard: Enigmatic settings and storytelling enrich the mysteries of Leonardo da Vincis gadgetry in this escape room puzzle series fantastic conclusion.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: The moving story of a lifetime

editorialNotes.standard: Movings a drag!Relocate tothis satisfying puzzler in which you unpack boxes filled with all sorts of goodies.

After a long day at work, its bath time! But Swampys shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Imagine WALLE directed by Tim Burtonthats the weird, wonderful world of Machinarium. But this cute robots quest for love combines tons more influenceslike point-and-click adventures, hidden-object puzzlers, and comic booksfor a truly unique experience. Challenging but full of awesome aha! moments, its an artistic odyssey that looks amazing on iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Brilliant puzzle designs and a haunting atmosphere make this unforgettable
editorialNotes.standard: Now heres how you build a sequel! With The Room Three, Fireproof Games kept everything we love about this seriesits chilling atmosphere, mind-bending puzzles and beautiful visualswhile making masterful enhancements. The story continues with trials set by a creepy new nemesis, The Craftsman. As you explore huge areas and tiny ones, the challenges feel increasingly epic, and a better-than-ever hint system ensures that finding solutions is super-rewarding.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Being able to write computer code is a supremely useful talent, but learning the basics can be a tough, tedious slog. Human Resource Machine wraps computer logic fundamentals inside a wonderful, whimsical puzzle game, full of cartoon conveyer belts and demanding managers. Its so much fun you might not realise how much knowledge youre soaking up.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Puzzle RPG: Return of the King

editorialNotes.short: Unravel family secrets on a remote island cursed by plagues in this dark puzzle adventure.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: This absorbing puzzler is so minimalist theres no start screen, no logos, no instructionsit just begins. We quickly got lost in the challenge of rearranging tiles, Rubiks Cubestyle, so a single line runs through each pattern. Our advice: sort out the corners and other unique tiles first, then the rest will snap quickly into place.
Looking for good vibes? This heartwarming puzzler delivers again and again as you help a hen rescue her chicks.

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: More A Little to the Left!
A story of beauty and illusion

editorialNotes.standard: We couldnt wait to go back to the land of twisty towers and uncanny beautyand this sequel didnt let us down. With its striking colours and level design, its even more stunning than the first game. New elements like light beams and controlling two characters make the puzzles even trickier. The bond between that mother and child is what well remember most, thoughtheir relationship moved us in a way few games do.
editorialNotes.short: An unforgettable adventure full of challenging puzzles and gorgeous visuals.

editorialNotes.standard: With relaxed swapping rules and charming graphics, this surprisingly slick match-3 puzzler makes the genre feel fresh again.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: A game with a chill factor

editorialNotes.tagline: Now with an infinite game mode
editorialNotes.standard: At a glance, hocus doesnt look very complicated. You swipe to move a red cube along a latticework of plain grey beams. But dont let the minimalist visuals fool youthe games intelligent, abstract puzzles force you to look at things in a new way, like a cubist translation of Monument Valley. As you progress, the levels quickly get complex. But the peaceful music and crisp design make spending time in its world a richly rewarding experience.

They say dont wake sleeping dogs, but poor Mimpi has been having some very weird dreams. From laboratories to forests to dangerous, debris-strewn waters, the only similarity between Mimpis dreamscapes is how fun they are to navigate. Each stage is filled with puzzles to solve and environmental objects to fiddle with. Youll knock down power lines, steer clouds, push suitcases, and (of course!) collect bones on your exhilarating journey through dreamlands.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: A Perfect Day: Go back to 1999

editorialNotes.standard: In reimagining the classic Tomb Raider games, Square Enix built a turn-based puzzler thats both true to its roots and completely fresh. This Apple Design Award winner pairs a gorgeous art style with super-fun gameplay where you avoid traps and collect relics. The experience feels so perfect for iOS, it was also our 2015 iPhone Game of the Year.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Use sound to escape the darkness
editorialNotes.standard: A chilling reminder that the threats you dont see can be the most terrifying, Dark Echo drops you into a pitch-black room with only sounds and vague outlines to guide you. Before long, youll be clinging to every little noise and flash of light, hoping to avoid buzzing flies and angry growls. And when you finally reach the unlatching door that leads to the next area, youll feel an exhilarating jolt of pure glee.

ios.subtitle: Can you escape the lab, again?

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Trickier A Little to the Left

editorialNotes.standard: Flow like water while manipulating mountains and valleys to coax a stream to riverhood.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: When dinosaurs collide with LEGO bricks, you dont have to be Mr. DNA to know the result is pure fun. Starring characters and creatures from all four Jurassic Park movies, this fantastic adventure lets you relive your favorite moments from the series and even create new ones with your own custom dinos. Full of all the humor, action, and surprises you expect, its a wacky team-up of T-Rex proportions.

editorialNotes.tagline: Jump in and save the ninjas!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
